mapper.select:
select aa.* from ( SELECT dealSeq ,dealName ,dealAddress ,dealZipCode ,dealAddressDetail ,dealGpsX ,dealGpsY ,dealManager ,dealTel ,dealManagerTel ,dealFaxNum ,dealDesc ,dealRegDate ,dealModDate ,dealUseNy ,dealDelNy
order by dealSeq desc ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT dealSeq ,dealName ,dealAddress ,dealZipCode ,dealAddressDetail ,dealGpsX ,dealGpsY ,dealManager ,dealTel ,dealManagerTel ,dealFaxNum ,dealDesc ,dealRegDate ,dealModDate ,dealUseNy ,dealDelNy FROM dealer WHERE 1=1 AND dealSeq = #{dealSeq}

select pdol.pdolSeq, pdol.pdolQty, pdol.pdolAmountPrice, pdol.pdolDelNy, pdol.product_prdtSeq, pdol.pdolStatusCd, prdt.prdtName, prdt.prdtPrice
from productorderlist pdol LEFT JOIN product prdt ON prdt.prdtSeq = pdol.product_prdtSeq LEFT JOIN productorder pdor ON pdol.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq LEFT JOIN dealer d ON pdor.dealer_dealSeq = d.dealSeq WHERE 1=1 and d.dealSeq = #{dealSeq}
mapper.update: update dealer set dealDelNy = 1 where dealSeq = #{dealSeq}
